manda eya etharam ma adhika mudalak waya wana karyayak nisa ya.emen ma mawisin chayarupayata nagana lada me dawantha pasuthalawala, widuli pandam eliyen nirmitha palamu saha eka ma chayarupa samuchchaya meya pamanak ma wanne ya....wiwidha janamadhyayan hi palawana samahara yedum athishayin sawadya ya.
